full_output.summary: I am deeply passionate about full-stack web development, data analytics, and AI/ML. My college projects have ignited a strong desire for further exploration. I aim to gain practical experience, refine my skills, and contribute to innovative projects in collaborative and challenging environments.
social_work: Co-head in College Technical Fest Nucleus.

projects.name: Amazon Sales Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Created an responsive dashboard on Power BI platform, where we haven taken a dataset which consisted data from Amazon where the dashboards shows the sales of products on basis of categories, profit by state, quantity and sum of total sales.

projects.name: Detection of Melanoma using Deep Learning
projects.description: Developed an skin cancer detection model which detects Benign / Malignant classes on the basis of the image loaded on the model, the technologies used here is CNN models like build an scratch model and MobileNetV2 where we applied Transfer Learning to improve its performance where Transfer Learning provided more accurate prediction.

projects.name: Twitter Sentiment Analysis using NLP & Supervised Learning
projects.description: A responsive UI-based sentiment analysis that focuses on customer tweets for feedback from different companies and using VADER provides sentiment analysis on the tweet.

experiences.description: Currently participating in the IBM SkillsBuild AI & ML Internship, covering foundational AI/ML concepts and applications using IBM Watson and IBM Cloud. Collaborating on a team project to solve a real-world problem, enhancing practical skills in AI/ML and teamwork.

full_output.name: Pratham Saraiya
